description:
Hiya, I'm Min. This is my first game as well as my first game jam, so please go easy on me :   ^). A lot of things went wrong and I nearly couldn't export it, and I kind of gave up in the middle :') but I still hope you get at least a little bit of enjoyment out of it. The theme 'Less is More' was applied in the following ways:

> simplistic art style

> lack of physical rewards

> progress that is more than it seems

ciao~
